changeSet.author: ndtdoanh
changeSet.sql:
INSERT INTO hackathons (id, title, sub_title, banner_image_url, enroll_start_date, enroll_end_date, description, information, start_date, end_date, max_teams, min_team_size, max_team_size, contact, category, organization, status, created_by_user_id, created_date) VALUES (1, 'AI Innovation Challenge', 'Exploring the Future of AI', 'https://doanthanhnien.vn/Content/uploads/images/132311755918511627_Banner.jpg', '2025-01-01 08:00:00', '2025-12-01 23:59:00', 'A hackathon focused on AI and Machine Learning.', 'Participants will develop AI-powered solutions.', '2024-01-01 08:00:00', '2028-12-01 23:59:00', 20, 3, 5, 'contact@ai-hackathon.com', 'CODING', 'FPTU', 'ACTIVE', 6, '2025-05-01 08:00:00'),
(2, 'Blockchain Revolution', 'Building the Next-Gen Blockchain Apps', 'https://i.chungta.vn/2021/01/07/hkt-6268-1610007165_1200x0.png', '2025-01-01 08:00:00', '2025-12-01 23:59:00', 'A hackathon focused on decentralized applications and smart contracts.', 'Teams will create blockchain-based solutions.', '2024-01-01 08:00:00', '2028-12-01 23:59:00', 15, 2, 6, 'contact@blockchain-hack.com', 'CODING', 'FPTU', 'ACTIVE', 6, '2025-04-01 08:00:00'),
(3, 'HealthTech Hackathon', 'Innovating Healthcare Solutions', 'https://assets.zyrosite.com/cdn-cgi/image/format=auto,w=328,h=410,fit=crop/YKb3LN2zOWc05D7L/poster4-mnlW25JWQJu732Gj.jpg', '2025-01-01 08:00:00', '2025-12-01 23:59:00', 'A hackathon to develop digital health solutions.', 'Participants will design and prototype healthcare applications.', '2024-01-01 08:00:00', '2028-12-01 23:59:00', 25, 3, 6, 'contact@healthtech-hack.com', 'CODING', 'FPTU', 'ACTIVE', 6, '2025-03-01 08:00:00'),
(4, 'Cybersecurity Challenge', 'Defending the Digital World', 'https://greenscapehub-media.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/hacofpt/bcdec61e-93f6-4b7f-bd53-c736e8f9e20f_generatedHeaderImage-1662578814159.jpg', '2025-01-01 08:00:00', '2025-12-01 23:59:00', 'A hackathon for ethical hackers and security researchers.', 'Teams will work on securing digital assets.', '2024-01-01 08:00:00', '2028-12-01 23:59:00', 18, 2, 5, 'contact@cybersecurity-hack.com', 'CODING', 'FPTU', 'ACTIVE', 6, '2024-01-01 08:00:00'),
(5, 'GreenTech Innovation', 'Innovating Eco-friendly Technologies', 'https://greenscapehub-media.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/hacofpt/d8af2511-ac99-4823-923f-5122fd8da84c_1supq92uyknelefyyf7ughw-15454498606631836572894-crop-1545449864895548482406.png', '2025-01-01 08:00:00', '2025-12-01 23:59:00', 'A hackathon to promote eco-friendly and sustainable technologies.', 'Participants will create green-tech solutions to tackle climate change.', '2024-01-01 08:00:00', '2028-12-01 23:59:00', 30, 3, 7, 'contact@greentech-hack.com', 'CODING', 'FPTU', 'ACTIVE', 6, '2023-01-01 08:00:00');
